sentences.en: ...instructions on how to calibrate a thermometer.
A direct means is required to calibrate the indirect method.
sentences.cn: 要求用直接测定法校正间接测定法.

sentences.en: A new approach to calibrate camera parameters by image pair is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出一种用图像对标定摄像机参数的新方法.

sentences.en: Apparatus maintenance : On - off and calibrate the test apparatus, writing the records.
sentences.cn: 仪器使用: 负责相关测试仪器的开关机和校验, 并填写相关记录.

sentences.en: Calibrate pesticide sprayers in order to assure that the desired application rate is being applied.
sentences.cn: 校准农药喷雾器的目的,是为了保证按所需的量予以喷洒.

sentences.en: Do you use accredited institute to calibrate your reference equipments?
sentences.cn: 你们是否有授权的机构来较准你们的参数设备?

sentences.en: It use software to calibrate the measure accuracy ±3 % and linearity ±0.15 %.
sentences.cn: 放大器不用转换量程,并使用软件校正,确保了测试光检测±3%的精度,±0.15%的线性.

sentences.en: My watch is faster, and I need calibrate it.
sentences.cn: 我的表走快了，我得把它校准。

sentences.en: Operate, calibrate, repair, and troubleshoot general and specialized instrumentation.
sentences.cn: 常用和专用仪器的操作 、 标定 、 维修及故障解决.

sentences.en: Pesticide levels in food are simply too difficult to calibrate.
sentences.cn: 食品中杀虫剂的含量很难精确测定。

sentences.en: So it is used instead to calibrate more practical current - measuring instrument, called ammeters.
sentences.cn: 因此,它只用于校准更实用的测量电流的仪表――安培计.

sentences.en: The experience coefficient method is used to calibrate the matrix effect.
sentences.cn: 用经验系数法校正基体效应.

sentences.en: They calibrate the effects of atom bombs in megadeaths.
sentences.cn: 他们校准原子弹的百万级杀伤力.

sentences.en: To force the test situation toward manageable proportions it is universal practice to calibrate.
sentences.cn: 为了使测试工作切实可行,普遍采用的是数据校准.

sentences.en: Use this wizard to calibrate the axes of your game controller.
sentences.cn: 使用该向导校准游戏控制器的轴.

sentences.en: You do not need to calibrate the Voltage Sensor or Power Amplifier.
sentences.cn: 你无需校准电压传感器和功率放大器.

words.tran_cn: [军] 口径；才干；水准（等于calibre）；器量
校准（calibrate的过去分词）；校准使...标准化

trans.tran_en: to check or slightly change an instrument or tool, so that it does something correctly

trans.tran_cn: 校准，使标准化，使合标准，测量（枪的）口径
trans.tran_en: to check or slightly change an instrument or tool, so that it does something correctly
